document_data.name: Steploe Nestletoe
document_data.mainbody: '''Steploe Nestletoe''' was a [[halfling]] member of the [[Cellarers' & Plumbers' Guild]] in [[Undermountain]] in [[1479 DR]].
document_data.History: In 1479 DR, he was with his crew in the city's sewers when their lights suddenly went dark and he was struck on the head. Steploe woke up in Undermountain as a prisoner of the [[goblin]] and [[kobold]] followers of the mad [[half-elf]] mercenary [[Zarr]]. However, he believed he knew of a sure escape and he could learn something from this experience.
